sentences.en: He made a surreptitious entrance to the club through the little door in the brick wall.
sentences.cn: 他从砖墙的小门偷偷进入俱乐部。

sentences.en: He was surreptitious in his movements.
His surreptitious behaviour naturally aroused suspicion.
sentences.cn: 他那鬼鬼祟祟的行为自然引起了旁人的怀疑.

sentences.en: I don't mind you smoking occasionally -- there's no need to be so surreptitious about it!
sentences.cn: 你偶尔吸烟我倒并不介意 -- 何必这样躲躲闪闪!

sentences.en: I have mastered the art of the surreptitious and covert glance over my shoulder.
sentences.cn: 我非常娴熟的掌握了回头偷看的技巧.

sentences.en: Mo Kan - cheng and the others exchanged surreptitious glances, but no one said anything.
sentences.cn: 莫干丞他们都面面相觑, 不作声.

sentences.en: Rory tried to sneak a surreptitious glance at Adam’s wristwatch.
sentences.cn: 罗里试图偷偷看一眼亚当的手表。

sentences.en: See her surreptitious one smiling face, my how queer.
sentences.cn: 看到她一幅诡秘的笑脸, 我好奇怪.

sentences.en: She sneaked a surreptitious glance at her watch.
Such surreptitious bypassing of Standlely was distasteful.
sentences.cn: 这种偷偷摸摸的绕过斯坦德莱的做法令人厌恶.
他们有过几次秘密会谈。

sentences.en: This can be a surreptitious method of mounting a takeover bid.
sentences.cn: 这可以是秘密发起收购的一种方式.

sentences.en: We always assumed it was nerves, or a surreptitious attempt to glance at their wristwatch.
sentences.cn: 通常出现这种情况时,我们会有两种假设:他可能很紧张, 或者只是想偷偷地看表.
